label: EcoWatt Cloud Gateway
info:
EcoWatt UI wired to Flask /api/uploads (actual parsed samples)
- /dashboard: Recent uploads grouped by device (expandable uploads) + recent benchmarks with min/avg/max
- /benchmarks: separate component for benchmark table + chart
- /api/data: HTML/JSON/CSV data viewer
- /api/flask_push: receiver for Flask -> Node-RED push payloads (stored in global.flask_pushes)

name: Dashboard (Grouped by Device + Bench Aggregates)
Data Viewer (from Flask)
Benchmarks Page (table + chart)
Store Flask Push
